name: Connor Rice
body:
# Areas of interest:
* Video game development
* Music software development
* Building digital instruments

# Projects:
## Short Circuit
[Short Circuit profile](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/ShortCircuit/)
> Short Circuit is a tower defense game made in jMonkeyEngine 3. 
![Gameplay](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/ShortCircuit.PNG)
> Here is some more footage:
![Gameplay](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/ShortCircuit2.png)

## Short Circuit SDK
[Short Circuit SDK profile](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/ScSDK/)
> Along with Short Circuit, I developed an SDK program which reads in an XML level file and creates a serialized object of the level that is more accessible and faster to load by the game engine.
![Screenshot](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/scsdk1.png)
![Screenshot](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/scsdk2.png)

## Critical Tools
[Critical Tools profile](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/CriticalTools/)
> Music software suite designed to aid in the production of a Musical Critical Edition. 

## Data Structures
[Data structures profile](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/DataStructures/)
> Java implementations of various data structures. Pictured below is a data structure that I built especially for Short Circuit.
![Screenshot](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/ds1.png)


## Come Together
[Come Together profile](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/ComeTogether/)

[Come Together second implementation](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/ComeTogetherCG/)
> Game I designed in a now defunct engine called "Slick2D", and in a custom engine.

## jPath
[jPath profile](http://screamconjoiner.github.io/jPath/)
> Example of A* pathfinding
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
